bioconda.name: bioconductor-piano
bioconda.summary: Platform for integrative analysis of omics data

biotools.summary: Performs gene set analysis using various statistical methods, from different gene level statistics and a wide range of gene-set collections. Furthermore, this package contains functions for combining the results of multiple runs of gene set analyses.

bioschemas.name: piano
bioschemas.summary: Performs gene set analysis using various statistical methods, from different gene level statistics and a wide range of gene-set collections. Furthermore, this package contains functions for combining the results of multiple runs of gene set analyses.
